Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dessert, Drinks, MainCourse

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Item has three types: Main course, Drinks and Dessert. These three type are inherited from Item class. In the Item class, there are some basic information about every item including name, description and price. Customers could choose those item.
